Welcome to the Order Api documentation!
=======================================
Order Api is a project for maintaining orders.


Introduction
============
Here you can register, list, delete and change orders. The User Api microservice is consulted to relate a request to a user.
This way it is possible to consult the orders made by a specific user.


Links
=====

`Git <https://github.com/SelecaoSerasaConsumidor/BE-KevinAraujo>`_
